## Secp256k1.verify() method

Verifies a RFC6979 ECDSA signature of given data with a given public key and hash algorithm.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static verify(options: {
        data: Uint8Array;
        hash: string;
        key: Uint8Array;
        signature: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { data: Uint8Array; hash: string; key: Uint8Array; signature: Uint8Array; } | The options for the verification operation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating whether the signature is valid.
